Title: Hoodwinked
Genre: Animation, Comedy, Crime, Family, Musical, Mystery
Director: Cory Edwards, Todd Edwards(co-director), Tony Leech(co-director)
Writer: Todd Edwards (story by), Cory Edwards (story by), Cory Edwards (screenplay by), Todd Edwards (screenplay by), Tony Leech (screenplay by)
Actors: Anne Hathaway, Glenn Close, Jim Belushi, Patrick Warburton
Plot: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.
